biotools.summary: Database that provides basic, up-to-date information on relevant literature, and a list of autophagy-related proteins and their homologs. From the database, the user can search for proteins by keywords or sequences to obtain a wealth of data including functional and structural information and find possible functional homologs of proteins whose functions have been demonstrated in other species.

bioschemas.name: The Autophagy Database
